explains: n. 黑白照片；单色照片（画）；黑白重现；单色复制

sentences.en: Printing a black-and-white negative on to colour paper produces a similar monochrome effect.
sentences.cn: 将黑白底片冲印在彩色纸上产生一种类似的单色效果。

sentences.en: It is also called as monochrome conversion.
sentences.cn: 这种技术也叫做单色转换。

sentences.en: It was ugly. It had a monochrome screen the size of a postage stamp.
sentences.cn: 它确实很丑，它仅配备了一块邮票大小的单色显示屏。
